author.name: Brother Arnulfus
author.description: A Benedictine monk who doth write devotional poems in Ænglish, praising God and the saints. His poems are often humorous, short, and satirical. They often contain metaphors of alcohol, especially wine or ale.

newsMedieval:
In the realm of paper, a merger grand,
Smurfit Kappa and WestRock hand in hand.
With Brother Tony at the lead,
A powerhouse of wealth indeed!

'Midst the turn of the market gale,
Fallen hath the price of metal, gold, and ale.
The dollar, through the tempest tossed,
Findeth stead as the tempest's lost 

From AB Foods, a prophecy of plenty,
Their pots o'erflow, from nine to twenty. 
Through robust sales, they lift their voice,
To praise the Lord and rejoice!

feedItems.title: $20 Billion Paper Powerhouse to Be Formed by Merger
feedItems.description: Smurfit Kappa and WestRock said they reached a tie-up agreement. Tony Smurfit will be CEO of the combined company.

feedItems.title: Metal Prices Temper After Strong Start to the Week
feedItems.description: Base metals and gold slipped in early trading as the dollar steadied after recent losses.

feedItems.title: AB Foods Lifts Guidance on Robust Sales Growth
feedItems.description: Associated British Foods said it expected adjusted operating profit for fiscal 2023 to be slightly better than previously forecast, with Primark same-store sales growth seen at 9%.

author.name: Conchobar mac Dubhthach
author.description: An Irish bard of yore, who weaves dulcet melodies that capture hearts with tender love songs. With a quill dipped in courtly love, he pens metaphors of devotion, igniting the flames of passion in every soul who hears his verse.

newsMedieval:
'Midst the dawning rays of morning, in the Albion's realm far-flung,
Wages climb yond inflation's grasp, though job's market echoes rung.
Yet the Tower of England bides, evidence of wages swung,
Despite dread of rising idle hands, a looser weave is strung.

Of Smurfit Kappa and of WestRock, a pact of unity sown,
Emerges a titan in papery grasp, a wealth of twenty billion shown.
On the NYSE and London's heart, their hefty value, full-blown,
Two became one in an economic dance, a merger writ in stone.

Whispers of silver in the emporium, steadied state of the greenback wrest,
Quiet be the dealing ahead, of Wednesday's CPI test.
In the hands of ING, prognostications jest,
Inflation's core may surprise us yet, 'tis but a gambler's quest.

feedItems.title: UK Wages Outpace Inflation, Despite Slowing Jobs Market
feedItems.description: U.K. wage growth held steady in the three months to July at a record level, outstripping inflation and offering the Bank of England further evidence of the persistence of rising wages, even as rising unemployment presents signs of a looser labor market.

feedItems.title: Smurfit Kappa and WestRock Merge
feedItems.description: Smurfit Kappa and WestRock have formally signed a merger agreement, creating a new company worth some $20 billion, with a main listing on the NYSE and a standard listing in London.

feedItems.title: Dollar Trading Seen Quiet Ahead of Wednesday's US CPI Data
feedItems.description: The dollar steadied after edging lower on Monday and ING said trading should be quiet ahead of Wednesday’s U.S. inflation data, adding that it sees risks of a higher-than-expected core print.

author.name: Æthelred the Skald
author.description: A Norse poet who doth regale his audience with tales of gods and heroes, praising their might and prowess. He references Norse mythology and history in his poems. He is known for metaphors involving the sea and the weather and weaponry.

newsMedieval:
In continent's heart, a game of thrones set,
Gods of coin, from Northlands bright and wet.
Marked sequences and monetary conversations,  
Risk does ride, 'fore ECB's firm dictations. 

Earthmother writhes, in Morocco's hallowed land,
Her quake's fierce might dealt by her own hand.
With keening wails and Hearth-homes tossed,
The slow-given aid, exacts a heavy cost. 

And far South in Colombia's verdant fields,
'tis a different crop that the harvest yields.
The white serpent’s gift grows vast, unbound,
As Bogotá with gentle hand lays down the hound.

feedItems.title: Eurozone Government Bond Supply to Come at Short-End of Curve
feedItems.description: Short-end government bond supply from Germany and Netherlands on Tuesday faces risks from the ECB’s upcoming meeting on Thursday, Citi said.

feedItems.title: Morocco's government faced criticism for being slow to accept international help in the aftermath of a 6.8 magnitude earthquake that has killed more than 2,850 people and left thousands homeless.
feedItems.description: Morocco’s government faced criticism for being slow to accept international help in the aftermath of a 6.8 magnitude earthquake that has killed more than 2,850 people and left thousands homeless.

feedItems.title: Colombia set a record in the estimated production of cocaine, the U.N. said, as Bogotá tries a less-punitive approach to fighting drugs.
feedItems.description: Colombia set a record in the estimated production of cocaine, the U.N. said, as Bogotá tries a less-punitive approach to fighting drugs.

author.name: Guillemette de Ventadour
author.description: A whimsical troubadour from Occitania, who cherishes the company of nature's gentle creatures. She often includes metaphors of goats, dogs, rabbits, and snails in her poetry. Her writing style is terse.

newsMedieval:
As e'er the goat stands sure 'fore raging flood,
So Libya neath storm's harsh tongue did wane;
Two score times a thousand lost to mud,
And thousands more, whereabouts remain unknown in vain.

Yet, like the loyal hound at patient wait,
The remedy to plague's vile bite is cleared;
By FDA's decree, we invigorate,
'Gainst newer strains, fresh defense thus reared.

And like the rabbit meeting snail in glade,
Do leaders Kim and Putin plan to meet;
The world looks on, ever cautious, afraid,
In hope that peace and concord prove more sweet.

feedItems.title: Senior officials in Libya said that as many as 2,000 people could be dead and thousands missing after a storm battered the country's east, causing flooding that swept entire neighborhoods out to sea.
feedItems.description: Senior officials in Libya said that as many as 2,000 people could be dead and thousands missing after a storm battered the country’s east, causing flooding that swept entire neighborhoods out to sea.

feedItems.title: The FDA cleared updated Covid-19 shots, which should protect against the latest versions of the virus.
feedItems.description: The FDA cleared updated Covid-19 shots, which should protect against the latest versions of the virus.

feedItems.title: North Korea's Kim plans to meet Russia's Putin, state media from both countries reported, the first official confirmation of the summit between the two leaders.
feedItems.description: North Korea’s Kim plans to meet Russia’s Putin, state media from both countries reported, the first official confirmation of the summit between the two leaders.
